title: Deportivo Ingeniería
text:
Club Deportivo Ingeniería is a Peruvian <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> club, based in the city of <a href="Huancayo">Huancayo</a>, of the <a href="Department%20of%20Jun%C3%ADn">Junín Region</a> in <a href="Peru">Peru</a>.
History.
In the <a href="2006%20Copa%20Per%C3%BA">2006 Copa Perú</a>, the club classified to the National Stage. They eliminated <a href="Sport%20Victoria">Sport Victoria</a> of <a href="Ica%2C%20Peru">Ica</a> in the round of 16 and <a href="Sport%20Huamanga">Sport Huamanga</a> of <a href="Ayacucho">Ayacucho</a> in the quarterfinals. However, the club was defeated by eventual champions, <a href="Total%20Clean">Total Clean</a>, in the semifinals.
